replace:
<xf:if is="$filters">
<xf:pagenav page="{$page}" perpage="{$perPage}" total="{$total}"
			link="search-forums/search" data="{$searchForum}" params="{$filters}" 
			wrapperclass="block-outer-main" />
		
<xf:else />

<xf:pagenav page="{$page}" perpage="{$perPage}" total="{$total}"
			link="search-forums" data="{$searchForum}"
			wrapperclass="block-outer-main" />
</xf:if>
